author: aamirriaz
post_text: December 3, 2025 at 3:11 PM#1Hey guys, bit of a push, but i'm certain i've seen it somewhere before (can't remember if it was a single macro or 2)Any help would be greatBasically what i'm wanting toStore cue - as a new cueGo to next cueThen (the trickier part)Copy the currently selected layout in layout view to the next available space in layouts and then rename it using the name from the last cue, in the selected cue list.I'm unsure if it might be easier to Copy the layout, copy the current cue name, then store + go.Or just have it as 2 seperate macro's.Any help would be amazing
title: Help creating a macro - copy pool item to next available space
